config.name: overProvisioning.memory
config.description: the over-provisioning raito of memory, which must be greater than 1. For example, 1.2 means to treat the memory as 120% of current size

config.name: overProvisioning.primaryStorage
config.description: the over-provisioning raito of primary storage, which must be greater than 1. For example, 1.2 means to treat the primary storage as 120% of current size

config.name: distributeImage
config.description: whether to destribute images to primary storage cache after they are added
